## Tools 

#### **Backend**

- [Solidity Decompiler (interface)](https://ethervm.io/decompile)
- [Heimdall-rs](https://github.com/Jon-Becker/heimdall-rs): An advanced EVM smart contract toolkit specializing in bytecode analysis
- [WhatsABI](https://github.com/shazow/whatsabi)
- [go-selfcompile](https://github.com/shazow/go-selfcompile)
- [scope-eth](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=popular.scope-eth): Remix-like foundry VSCode plugin
- [arbiter](https://github.com/primitivefinance/arbiter): Simulation driven development via an EVM emulator
- [Echidna](https://github.com/crytic/echidna): Fast smart contract fuzzer
- [Medusa](https://github.com/crytic/medusa): Parrellizable fuzz testing through CLI or Go API
- [Simple Serialization](https://simpleserialize.com/): A serialization and merkleization standard created specifically for Ethereum consensus
- [MergeMock](https://github.com/protolambda/mergemock)

#### **Full-Stack**

- [Scaffold Eth](https://github.com/scaffold-eth/scaffold-eth-2)
